THE WEAKNESSES OF THE NATIONAL TEAM ARE FROM THE PAST:
1. When the opponent plays direct football, such as the match against China, Australia. Because Indonesia's back defense is often perforated and late, many are off position.
.

.
3. Since the past, the Indonesian coach has always known that Indonesia must utilize set pieces in many ways and utilize long throw-ins. Since the past, the Indonesian national team coach has also known that Indonesia's weakness is anticipating dead balls, but since being with him it has slowly improved, but now it has worsened again.
.

.

The principle that has been instilled by the previous coach: "FIX THE DEFENSE FIRST, THEN THE TEAM WILL BE ABLE TO TRUST EACH OTHER AND SCORE GOALS EASIER"
